column1: # Descripion: table defining elements in main observations table
# Source:
ElementNumbertElementNametKindtExternalTabletWIGOS # (MCO)tDescription
1tReportID tbigint (pk)ttNAtUnique ID for report (unique ID given by combination of RecordID and ObservationID)
2tRegion tint (fk)tRegiont3-01 (C)tRegion (WMO region / Ocean basin)
3tSubRegion tint (fk)tSubRegiont3-02 (C)tCountry / regional sea
4tApplicationArea tint[] (fk)tApplicationAreat2-01 (M)tWMO application area(s)
5tObservingProgramme tint (fk)tObservingProgrammet2-02 (M)tObserving programme, e.g. VOS
6tReportType tint (fk)tReportTypetNAte.g. SYNOP, TEMP, CLIMAT, etc
7tStationName tvarchartt3-03 (M)te.g. GRUAN station name, ship name, site name etc
8tStationType tint (fk)tStationTypet3-04 (M)tType of station, e.g. land station, sea station etc
9tPlatformType tint (fk)tPlatformTypetNAtStructure upon which sensor is mounted, e.g. ship, drifting buoy, tower etc
10tPlatformSubType tint (fk)tPlatformSubTypetNAtSub-type for platform, e.g. 3m discuss buoy
11tPrimaryStationIdtvarchartt3-06 (M)tUnique (WMO) station identifier, e.g. WIGOS ID
12tPrimaryStationIdSchemetint (fk)tIDSchemetNAtScheme used for unique station ID
13tSecondaryStationIdtvarchartttAlternate (local) ID for station, e.g. Network ID
14tSecondaryStationIdSchemetint (fk)tIDSchemettAlternate ID Scheme, e.g. Network ID
15tStationLocation_Longitudetnumeric tt3-07 (M)tLongitude of station, -180.0 to 180.0 (or other as defined by StationCRS)
16tStationLocation_Latitudetnumerictt3-07 (M)tLatitude of station, -90 to 90 (or other as defined by StationCRS)
17tStationLocationAccuracytnumericttNAtAccuracy to which station location recorded (radius in km)
18tStationLocationQualitytint (fk)tLocationQualitytNAtQuality flag for station location
19tStationCRS tint (fk)tCRSt11-FebtCoordinate reference scheme for station location
20tSurfaceType tint (fk)tSurfaceTypet4-01 (C)te.g. rolling hills
21tSurfaceTypeScheme tint (fk)tSurfaceTypeSchemet4-02 (C)tScheme used to classify surface cover
22tSiteTopography tint (fk)tSiteTopographyt4-03 (C)tDescription of local topography and broader context
23tStationConfigurationtbigint (fk)tStationConfigurationtNAtLink to station metadata / configuration
24tHeightOfStationAboveLocalGround tnumerictt3-07 (M)tHeight of station above local ground (m)
25tHeightOfStationAboveSeaLevel tnumerictt3-07 (M)tHeight of station above mean sea level (m), negative values for below sea level.
26tHeightOfStationAboveSeaLevelAccuracytnumerictttAccuracy to which height of station known (m)
27tSeaLevelDatumtint (fk)tSeaLevelDatumttDatum used for sea level
28tReportMeaningOfTimeStamptint (fk)tMeaningOffTimeStampt11-03 (M)tReport time - beginning, middle or end of reporting period
29tReportYeartinttttYear of report (UTC)
30tReportMonthtinttttMonth of report (UTC)
31tReportDaytinttttDay of report (UTC)
32tReportHourtinttttHour of report (UTC)
33tReportMinutestinttttMinute of report (UTC)
34tReportSecondstinttttSeconds of report (UTC)
35tReportDurationtinttttReport duration (s), e.g. 86400 = daily obs, 3600 hourly etc
36tReportTimeAccuracytnumericttNAtPrecision to which time was recorded (s)
37tReportTimeQualitytint (fk)tTimeQualitytNAtQuality flag for ReportDateTime
38tReportTimeReferencetint (fk)tTimeReferencettReference Time (e.g. referenced to time server, atomic clock, radio clock etc)
39tProfileConfiguration tbigint (fk)tProfileConfigurationtNAtInformation on profile (atmospheric / oceanographic) configuration. Set to Record ID for profile data or missing (NULL) otherwise.
40tEventsAtStationtint (fk)tEventsAtStationt4-04 (O)te.g. ship hove to, crop burning etc.
41tReportQualitytint (fk)tQualityFlagtNAtOverall quality of report
42tDuplicateStatus tint (fk)tDuplicateStatustNAtE.g. no duplicates, best duplicate, duplicate, not checked.
43tDuplicates tbigint [] (fk)tthistNAtArray of reportIDs for duplicates
44tMaintenanceAndUpdateFrequency tint (fk)tUpdateFrequencytNAtFrequency with which modifications and deletions are made to the data after it is first produced
45tHistory tbigint (fk)tReportHistorytNAtSequence of processing steps – link to table
46tRecordYeartint tttYear of revision of this record (UTC)
47tRecordMonthtint tttMonth of revision of this record (UTC)
48tRecordDaytint tttDay of revision of this record (UTC)
49tRecordHourtint tttHour of revision of this record (UTC)
50tRecordMinutetint tttMinute of revision of this record (UTC)
51tRecordSecondstint ttNAtSeconds of revision of this record (UTC)
52tProcessingLeveltinttReportProcessingLevelttLevel of processing applied to this report
53tProcessingCode(s)tint[]tReportProcessingCodettProcessing applied to this report
54tSourceID tint (fk)tSourceConfigurationtNAtOriginal source of data – link to table
55tSourceRecordId tvarcharttNAtRecord ID in source data, e.g. ID of event from GRUAN meta database
56tDataPolicyLicence tint (fk)tDataPolicyLicencet9-02 (M)tWMOessential, WMOadditional, WMOother
57tObservationID tint (pk)tttTogether with RecordID forms unique ID for observation / record
58tObservedVariable tint (fk)tObservedVariablet1-01 (M)tThe variable being observed / measured
59tUnits tint (fk)tUnitst1-02 (M)tUnits for the observed variable
60tCodeTable tint (fk)tObservationCodeTabletNAtEncode / decode table for variable (if encoded)
61tObservationValue tnumericttNAtThe observed value
62tObservationValueSignificancetint (fk)tValueSignificancetNAte.g. min, max, mean, sum
63tObservationTimestampMeaningtint (fk)tMeaningOffTimeStampt11-03 (M)tbeginning, middle, end
64tObservationYeartint tt1-03 (M)tYear ofobservation (UTC)
65tObservationMonthtint tt1-03 (M)tMonth of observation (UTC)
66tObvservationDaytint tt1-03 (M)tDay of observation (UTC)
67tObservationHourtint tt1-03 (M)tHour of observation (UTC)
68tObservationMinutetint tt1-03 (M)tMinutes of observation (UTC)
69tObservationSecondstint tt1-03 (M)tSeconds of observation (UTC)
70tObservationDuration tinttt7-09 (M)tDuration/period over which observation was made (s)
71tObservationLongitudetnumerictttLongitude of the observed value, -180 to 180 (or other as defined by CRS)
72tObservationLatitudetnumerictt1-04 (M)tLatitude of the observed value, -90 to 90 (or other as defined by CRS)
73tObservationLocationMethod tint (fk)tLocationMethodt11-01tMethod of determining location,
74tObservationLocationPrecision tnumerictttPrecision to which location is reported (radius km)
75tObservationBoundingBoxMinLongitudetnumerictt1-04 (M)tBounding box for observation, valid range given by CRS
76tObservationBoundingBoxMaxLongitudetnumerictt1-04 (M)tBounding box for observation, valid range given by CRS
77tObservationBoundingBoxMinLatitudetnumerictt1-04 (M)tBounding box for observation, valid range given by CRS
78tObservationBoundingBoxMaxLatitudetnumerictt1-04 (M)tBounding box for observation, valid range given by CRS
79tObservationSpatialRepresentativeness tint (fk)tSpatialRepresentativenesst1-05 (O)tSpatial representativeness of observation
80tObservationHeightAboveStationSurface tnumerictt5-05 (C)tPositive values for above surface (e.g. sondes), negative for below (e.g. xbt)
81tObservationZCoordinate tnumerictt5-05 (C)tz coordinate of observation
82tObservationZCoordinateType tint (fk)tZCoordinateTypet5-05 (C)tType of z coordinate
83tObservationZCoordinateMethodtint (fk)tZCoordinateMethodttMethod of determining z coordinate
84tQualityFlag tint (fk)tQualityFlagt8-03 (M)tQuality flag for observation
85tNumericalPrecision tinttt7-12 (O)tReporting precision of observation in units given by 'Units' variable. Equivalent to BUFR scale factor
86tStandardUncertainty tnumerictt8-01 (C)tStandard uncertainty in reported value
87tMethodOfEstimatingStandardUncertainty tint (fk)tUncertaintyMethodt8-02 (C)tMethod of estimating the standard uncertainty
88tUncertaintyDueToCorrelatedErrors tnumerictt8-01 (C)tUncertainty due to errors in the observation that are correlated between observations
89tMethodOfEstimatingUncertaintyDueToCorrelatedErrors tint (fk)tUncertaintyMethodt8-02 (C)t
90tUncertaintyDueToUncorrelatedErrors tnumeric tt8-01 (C)tUncertainty due to errors in the observation that are uncorrelated between observations
91tMethodOfEstimatingUncertaintyDueToUncorrelatedErrors tint (fk)tUncertaintyMethodt8-02 (C)t
92tUncertaintyDueToSystematicErrors tnumeric tt8-01 (C)tUncertainty due to errors in the observations that are correlated under similar observing conditions
93tMethodOfEstimatingUncertaintyDueToSystematicErrors tint (fk)tUncertaintyMethodt8-02 (C)t
94tTotalUncertainty tnumeric tt8-01 (C)t
95tMethodOfEstimatingTotalUncertainty tint (fk)tUncertaintyMethodt8-02 (C)t
96tSensorConfigurationtint (fk)tSensorConfigurationtt
97tSensorAutomationStatus tint (fk)tAutomationt5-01 (M)tAutomated, manual, mixed or visual observation
98tExposureOfSensor tint (fk)tSensorExposureQualityt5-15 (C)tWhether the exposure of the instrument will impact on the quality of the measurement
99tOriginalPrecision tint ttNAtOriginal reporting precision in units given by 'OriginalUnits'
100tOriginalUnits tint (fk)tUnitstNAtOriginal units
101tOriginalValue tnumeric ttNAtOriginal value as reported or recorded in log book.
102tConversionFactor tint (fk)tConversionFactort7-01 (O)tLink to table describing conversion process
103tProcessingCode tint (fk)tProcessingCodet7-01 (O)te.g. TRC (temperature radiation corrections) etc. Encoded in table.
104tProcessingLevel tint (fk)tProcessingLevelt7-06 (O)tLevel of processing applied to observation.
105tAdjustmentID tint (fk)tAdjustmentsTablett
106tTraceability tint (fk)tTraceabilityt8-05 (C)tWhether observation can be traced to international standards.
